text: Spring in Moscow () is a 1953 Soviet movie directed by Iosif Kheifits and Nadezhda Kosheverova.В петербургском БДТ представят "советский "Ла-Ла Ленд" It stars Galina Korotkevich, Vladimir Petrov, and Yuri Bublikov. ==Actors== * Galina Korotkevich as Nadezhda * Vladimir Petrov as Mikhail * Yuri Bublikov as Yasha * Anatoliy Kuznetsov as Ivan * Vladimir Taskin as Aleksandr Petrov / old Rybkin * Leo Shostak as Zdobnov, docent == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1953 musical movies Category:1953 drama movies Category:Soviet musical movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Movies directed by Iosif Kheifits Category:Movies directed by Nadezhda Kosheverova
title: Spring in Moscow
